item.title: Prompt Engineering for Cloud Architects: 10 Powerful Tips
item.description:
Prompt engineering isnâ€™t just for AI developers. As Cloud Architects, we deal with large, complex systems, documentation, and decision-making daily. With the rise of AI assistants like GitHub Copilot, Azure Copilot, and ChatGPT, prompt engineering has become a valuable tool in our toolbox.

Here are Prompt Engineering for Cloud Architects: 10 Powerful Tips to boost your productivity, decision-making, and solution design as a Cloud Architect.

1. Be Clear, Concise, and Contextual

Bad Prompt:
